amendment.description: Amendment requires the FAA to preserve original aircraft engineering data in the agency's possession and to require such data to be made available to the public, for non-commercial purposes, upon a Freedom of Information Act request.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 112-46 to prohibit the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) from destroying vintage aircraft type certificate data and to require such data to be made available to the public, for non-commercial purposes, upon a Freedom of Information Act request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
